Employee Management App

Manager App

This a web based App that keeps all the Employees records in a firm, it contains all the attributes needed to satisfactory describe an Employee. Only allows managers & only authorized personels to access the stored records. It also offers features such as Add a new Employee, edit details, delete and other records.

All the information is kept safely and securely on the firebase firestore database, the data stored is accessed in a matter nano seconds: this database ensures that you no longer have to worry due to data loss and that you can acess the information at any place.

Technology

Employee Management App uses Materialize and Bootstrap for a mobile first layout, with jQuery for easy page manipulation and to provide a cool UI it utilizes Vue, On the backend an Express/Nodejs app lives on firebase firestore that acts as a middleware and database to return the information to the user.

Tools I use


JavaScript

Vue js

Materialize

Firebase

Bootstrap

css3
